name: rac1 v3.3.1

* Small fixes
* Replace Picasso by Glide

name: v3.1.0
body:
* Support Android Kitkat and above (api 19+)
* Stability improvements
* Bug fixing

name: v.3.0.3
body: * Bug fixing

name: v3.0.2
body: * Bug fixing

name: App redesign + new features
body:
* App rewritten in Kotlin
* Implemented Media Browser Compat Service
* Redesign of programs view
* New media player features (sleep timer, fast forward, rewind)
* Playlists
* Media controls in notifications

name: v2.2.1
body:
* enably minify on release builds
* integrate Appsee

name: v2.2.0
body:
- New launcher icons
- Bug fixing
- optimize network calls
- Remove autoplay on resume

name: v2.0.3
body: * Crash and bug fixing

name: v2.0.1
body:
- New API
- Latest podcasts sections removed due to the new api
- Add option to export podcasts to a public folder

name: v1.11.1
body: - Fix crash when loading programs.

name: v1.11.0
body:
- Image optimization
- Stability improvements & bug fixing

name: v1.10.0
body:
- The list of programs is now read from a url.
- It also allows to read the program's sections, which are now available to listen/download.
- Bug fixing and minor improvements.

name: v1.9.0
body:
- Allows to download and listen to podcasts while offline.
- Delete downloaded podcasts.
- Images are now stored in the app.

name: v1.9.1
body: Add write external storage permission.

- Create gradient background for the new images
